ministry.name: New Believer's Ministry
ministry.overview: The purpose of the New Believer's Ministry is to make disciples by teaching students to observe all things Jesus has commanded us.

long-description.p: Want to grow in your understanding of basic Bible teachings? Either for the first time or to refresh your understanding of these fundamental truths? Then a New Believer's class may be just for you. The New Believer's classes are opportunities for other like minded individuals and provide an opportunity for fellowship with one another.

These 12-week classes are offered at various times through out the year and are available for adults seeking to grow in this way. Students in advance of class night spend time in praying for one another and studying the Bible using curriculum provided by the instructor. The New Believer's curriculum is based on materials provided by Calvary Chapel Costa Mesa.
